Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier track switching problems near 35th-Bronzeville-IIT. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier track switching problems near 35th-Bronzeville-IIT.

Trains are moving.  Please allow extra travel time.
